amendment.description: To require the disclosure of the dimensions of seats on aircraft to enable parents to determine if their child safety seats will fit in those seats.

vote.text: Amendment SA 94 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 94 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S832-833) To require the disclosure of the dimensions of seats on aircraft to enable parents to determine if their child safety seats will fit in those seats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 94 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 94 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Boxer.
